user.title: Connect to Fireboard
user.description:
Use your Fireboard credentials.

(If a 40x error is thrown, verify your credentials here: https://fireboard.io/accounts/login/)

data_description.username: The email address associated with your Fireboard account.
data_description.polling_interval: The polling rate determines how long the integration should wait before polling for data again. Fireboard has a cap at 200 polls/hr. The minimum is 20s; 60s is recommended to avoid conflicts.

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your email and password.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Fireboard servers.
